title: Typical players you will meet in soloQ
body:
Here's my list based on expierence in playing silver-platina soloQ

**INSTALOCK TIER**
{{champion:55}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:75}}  - "I don't care that enemy has my natural counter, I will just instalock my champ silently no matter what lanes are picked and what is my pick order"
**HIGH HOPES TIER**
{{champion:268}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:45}} - "They can't be THAT bad. I'm gonna try it"
**CRAZY MECHANICS TIER**
{{champion:69}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:238}} - "omg my team sucks so hard I am the only one playing, also Imma smurf"
**SEASON2 NOSTALGIA TIER**
{{champion:122}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:3}} - how the things in 2011?
*SEASON2 NOSTALGIA-FROGGEN TIER*
{{champion:34}} 
**I JUST GOT OWNED BY THIS I'M GONNA PICK IT 2\13  TIER**
{{champion:114}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:80}} - "wtf lucky noob"
**THE ULTIMATE KILLER TIER**
{{champion:40}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} +{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}} - "please pick exhaust please why are not answering the game will start in 10 second exhaust please please pick exhaust FUCK YOU"
**THE PREDICTIONS TIER**
{{champion:105}} - "12\18 team score gg guys I'm afk untill 20 then surr bye"
**YASUO 4\13 TIER**
{{champion:157}} +{{champion:62}} +{{champion:54}} - no comments

**THE I-LOOKED-TIERLIST-ONLINE TIER**
{{champion:254}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:39}} - "dw I got dis/ez"

**THE THIS GAME I'M GONNA BE COMPLETE USELESS SHIT TIER**
{{champion:27}}  - never talks, never pings, never participate in teamfight
**FUCK THIS SHIT CANCER CHAMP OMG YOU ARE SO ANNOYING FFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUU**
{{champion:17}} {{champion:35}} - spam ctrl+4
**DUO PREMADE BOT TIER**
{{champion:99}} +{{champion:25}}  / {{champion:7}} + {{champion:4}} 
**PING PONG YOU ARE DEAD TIER**
{{champion:92}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:7}} - OUTPLAYED
**THE EITHER SHIT OR GODLIKE TIER**
{{champion:119}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:120}} 
**WHO IS THIS GUY TIER**
{{champion:154}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:266}} - "pls don't pick trundle"

It's dangerous to go alone in soloQ. Take this **YOUR FRIEND HAS DIAMOND BORDER TIER** {{champion:59}}  2-11 in 20 minutes

replies.body:
I havent played ranked yet because im not that good, overal but my role if id get to pick would be jungle nidalee, even if im getting hugely counterd by lets say jungle vi

why : i know how to play this champ yet i wouldnt know how to play a vi counter

i can stil avoid the enemy jungle place wards and try and catch him at his worst moment ever

i can stil give good ganks to my team and try and get fed before he does

can someone explain to me why this is a bad thing ?

 Id get that when being hard counterd in lane makes you useless the rest of the game since you are constantly dealing with this enemy

but in the jungle i wont be able to duel him sure but if he invades il ask for assistance and il 2v1, 

Counter jungling might be dangerouse but i dont have to counter jungle
None of isntalock-tier champions are jungling in current meta, only top\mid
Wut tier is 4 the cocky people?
but i like azir :(  5-0 in ranked
{{champion:21}} cntrl+4 win every game, no joke...unless your ally can't take it. Can go both ways.
So that's why whenever a J4 has diamond border they're shit. I see.
